entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Terrace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:20 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Airport 3:20 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: N 27 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
